html:
adesso has also summarised its expertise in the field of cloud computing in a very recent Cloud technology radar. This report helps companies maintain an overview of the wide variety of methods, technologies, platforms, tools, frameworks, and languages. In this regard, the experts at adesso have tested and evaluated the range of services and technologies in order to support companies in the selection and development of their cloud infrastructure in the best possible way.

The Cloud technology radar is available to download free of charge here.
